function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Recommend building measures not implemented correctly","Impact":"Increased environmental concentrations of airborne pathogens and higher spread of infection","Mitigation":"Proper training and oversight of implementation, regular maintenance and monitoring","Technologies":"Air filtration and purification systems, ventilation control systems","People":"Building occupants, general public","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of focus on airborne transmission reduction in hospitals and public buildings","Impact":"Increased risk to healthcare workers, patients, and the general public from airborne transmission","Mitigation":"Implementation of engineering controls, regular assessment of ventilation systems","Technologies":"Ventilation control systems, air quality monitoring devices","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, general public","Owner":"Hospital administrators, public health authorities"}]}
